result.name: 2000-hastings-shingle-bank-crab-depletion-study
result.notes:
The feasibility of using catch depletion methodologies as a way of assessing 
edible crab (*Cancer pagurus*) stocks was investigated on the Hastings 
Shingle Bank commercial crabbing ground, situated in the eastern English 
Channel between 20 and 32 km offshore, centred around position 50o 48'N. 00
o 38'E.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network

organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
